about: Built with love by the fikZax team.

aboutUs.title: About fikZax Creators
aboutUs.legend1: Arco da Porta Nova (New City Door Gate)
aboutUs.legend3: Jardim de Santa Bárbara (Saint Barbara Garden)
aboutUs.text1: We are a small creative company that thrives in innovation, just like the city we are located, the historical city of Braga.
aboutUs.text2: See above some of our city's iconic views which are inspirational for our work!

description.part0: A robot to manage your schedule, so you can do what you love.
description.part1: Please, put your mobile in silent mode. fikZax will take care of all your working slots scheduling. By leveraging the power of Facebook's Messenger, fikZax will set, cancel, reschedule and confirm all the appointments you will have with your clients. All you need is to have a Facebook Page, and fikZax, of course!

professional.title: From My Point of View
professional.sec1title: Local Scheduling Using Only The App
professional.sec1text10: How can I schedule locally, without using the robot???
professional.sec1text20: Please note that to be able to do what we are portraying here, one first needs to configure fikZax!
professional.sec1text21: With the configuration done, and the scheduling slots generated, you can start scheduling. Here you have the month view of fikZax's first screen, you can swipe, or press the button on the lower part of the screen, to see the detailed screen.
professional.sec1text22: The month view shows a general view of the scheduling, with an easy to check color coded occupation percentage of slots.
professional.sec1text30: This is the detailed view screen. You can get here by tapping on any day shown in the month view, thus allowing for a detail of this very day. In this example, we have tapped on the 10th of January of 2020.
professional.sec1text31: In the top left corner of the cards you see the slot start time.
professional.sec1text32: In the top right corner the professional name.
professional.sec1text33: In the center, in bold letters, the client name.
professional.sec1text34: In the bottom left, in chips, the current state of the slot.
professional.sec1text35: In the bottom right the location where the service is to be performed.
professional.sec1text40: By double tapping any of the slot cards you will be able to edit the slot.
professional.sec1text41: Here we have the edit screen of the 10am slot. In this case, we have selected the client and checked the box marking that the slot is scheduled. So, you have just made a manual scheduling using fikZax! Save the changes and move on.
professional.sec1text50: Coming back to the central detailed screen, you can now see that the slot state changed to Scheduled and Verify.
professional.sec1text51: By tapping on the Verify chip you will open the verification dialog.
professional.sec1text60: In the dialog you see that the slot was scheduled by myself (Jorge Gonçalves) and also when I did it. If you do it yourself, you will see your name here. So, now tap on verify appointment!
professional.sec1text70: Now, in the verification screen you can either confirm or cancel the appointment.
professional.sec1text71: In this case, in which the appointment was manually set, this screen is a bit of an overkill.
professional.sec1text80: The verification was successful, i.e., the client was successfully notified. Please note that this is only possible to clients with a Facebook account, as we send this notification through Messenger.
professional.sec1text90: Coming back to the central detailed screen, you can now see that the slot state changed to Scheduled and Verified By Professional.
professional.sec1text100: Finally, we get to the point where the client confirms that will attend to the appointment.
professional.sec1text101: By tapping on the confirm chip you can check when the appointment was confirmed by the client.
professional.sec2text10: That is why we are here!!!! Let's schedule USING the chat robot!!!!
professional.sec2text20: As a matter of fact, tha actual scheduling, in this case, is done by the client inside the Messenger app. Here you will see the slot showing up as scheduled and the chip showing that there is a need for the professional to verify this scheduling.
professional.sec2text21: To do that, just tap on the verify chip and the verification dialog will show up!
professional.sec2text30: The verification procedure is exactly the same as we have shown before. But, differently from the first case, as you can see in the dialog, this appointment was scheduled by fikZax!!!!
professional.sec2text31: We will skip the actual verification screen, as we would be just repeating ourselves.
professional.sec2text40: Coming back to the central detailed screen, you can now see that the slot state changed to Scheduled and Verified By Professional.
professional.sec2text50: Last but not least, we get to the point where the client confirms that will attend to the appointment.
professional.sec2text51: By tapping on the confirm chip you can check when the slot was confirmed by the client.

client.title: To My Client
client.sec1text10: How will your client discover your brand new fikZax chat robot????
client.sec1text30: Add a Send Message button to your business' page in Facebook, this will take your client directly to the Messenger chat robot.
client.sec1text40: Send your client a link to your Messenger chat robot, generated by the fikZax app.
client.sec1text50: Show your client the QRCODE generated by your fikZax app, that will take he/she directly to your Messenger chat robot.
client.sec2text10: How will your client use your fikZax chat robot????
client.sec2text20: When your chat robot is discovered (In this case we are using the MyMensor Service Center that was created for demonstration purposes only!!!), your client will get to this screen inside Messenger.
client.sec2text21: The message shown in this example is the standard one. It can be customized in the fikZax app.
client.sec2text30: After pressing the GET STARTED button, your client will be greeted by the robot. This greeting can be modified in the fikZax app.
client.sec2text40: In the bottom of Messenger screen, your client will find a menu to interact with the robot. The items' texts can be customized in the fikZax app.
client.sec2text50: By pressing the SCHEDULE AN APPOINTMENT menu item, your client will be shown the first available scheduling slot, as per the setup made in the fikZax app.
client.sec2text51: There you can set both the minimum and the maximum interval to be booked, say, minimum one day from now and maximum six months from now.
client.sec2text52: You can see that the client has three options: to accept this slot, to ask for the next available one or ask for other options. The first two are obvious, the third one will ask for which weekday and time of the day are preferred by the client, with that info, the chat robot will present the next available slot that is compliant.

features.title: Main Features
features.text10: fikZax is available everyday, 24/7! Your customer can contact you and set an appointment ANYTIME! Even when you've gone fishing!!!
features.text20: No computer needed to manage your agenda! Use your mobile phone or tablet, either Apple or Android, and control ALL functionalities of fikZax.
features.text30: Scheduling Appointments Online in real time. You can see the scheduling as it happens! You will have your professional agenda all the time with you.
features.text40: The scheduling confirmation is not just a reminder. The customer can confirm the appointment, as well as reschedule or cancel it. This will significantly decrease the no-show cases.
features.text50: Complete control of your work schedule. You can customize and combine different schedules in different locations to build your own schedule.
features.text60: fikZax brand is COMPLETELY INVISIBLE to your customer. It will work as YOUR private robot, with YOUR brand, inside YOUR Messenger account, no hidden propaganda!
features.text70: When setting up non-working days calendar, fikZax helps you with most of the expected non-working days already defined. You can define different non-working days calendar for different work locations and different professionals.
features.text80: After fikZax generates your appointment slots, you can modify them individually, as things change!

legal.title: Privacy Policy & Terms of Service
legal.policy3: This Privacy Policy sets forth fikZax's policy with respect to information including personally identifiable data and other information that is collected from visitors to the Site and Services.
legal.policy4: This privacy policy governs your use of a software application (Service), including both a Mobile app running on mobile devices, and a Website application that runs on both mobile and desktop/laptop devices, that was created by fikZax.
legal.policy6: The Service obtains the information you provide when you download and register the Service (Provided Data). Registration is required to use our Service. When you register with us and use the Service, you provide, either directly or indirectly: (a) an email address, an username and a password (or other access code to a third party); (b) information you provide us when you contact us for help, and; (c) information you enter into our system when using the Service, such as images, videos, remarks, texts and numerical data. We may also use the information you provided us to contact you from time to time to provide you with important information, required notices and marketing promotions.
legal.policy7: In addition, the Service may collect certain information automatically (Collected Information), such as the type of mobile device you use, your mobile devices unique device ID, the IP address of your device, your operating system, the type of Internet browsers you use, and information about the way you use the Service. Sometimes we aggregate user data anonymously to understand our customer base better.
legal.policy8: Data Retention Policy; Managing Your Information
legal.policy9: We will retain User Provided data for as long as you use the Service and for a reasonable time thereafter. If you would like to delete User Provided Data that you have provided via the Service, you can do so inside our mobile app and inside our web app, for the relevant portions of information, furthermore, if you want to completely wipe all information from our servers please contact us and we will respond in a reasonable time. Please note that some or all of the User Provided Data may be required in order for the Service to function properly, and we may be required to retain certain information by law.
legal.policy11: All users of our Service are entitled to the following data protection rights:
legal.policy12: (a) Right to access: you have the right to request copies from your personal information stored with us. We may charge a small fee for this service.
legal.policy13: (b) Right to rectification: you have the right to request the correction and/or the completion of any information we may hold about you that you believe that is inaccurate and/or incomplete.
legal.policy14: (c) Right to be forgotten: you have the right to request that we erase every and all of your personal data we hold with us, under certain conditions.
legal.policy15: (d) Right to restrict processing: you have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
legal.policy16: (e) Right to object to processing: you have the right to object that we process of your personal data, under certain conditions.
legal.policy17: (f) Right to data portability: you have the right to request that we transfer all of your personal data back to you, under certain conditions.
legal.policy18: If and when you make such a request, we shall have one month to respond to you. To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at privacy@fikzax.com
legal.policy20: Our Service works with a direct integration to online third-party services (Third-Party Services). In order to take advantage of this feature, you have to authenticate, register for or log into Third-Party Services through the Service or on the websites of their respective providers. When you enable linking between or log in to Third-Party Services through the Service, we will collect relevant information necessary to enable the Service to access that Third-Party Service and your data and content contained within that Third-Party Service (Login Credentials). We store your Login Credentials long enough to enable linking to the Third-Party Service.
legal.policy21: When you enable the Service to link content and data between Third-Party Services, the Third-Party Services will provide us with access to certain information that you may have provided to the Third-Party Services, and we will use, store and disclose such information in accordance with this Privacy Policy and the rules you set to govern the linking. However, please remember that the manner in which Third-Party Services use, store and disclose your information is governed by the policies of such Third-Party Services, and fikZax shall have no liability or responsibility for the privacy practices or other actions of any Third-Party Services that may be enabled within the Service.
legal.policy23: We use a third party payment processor to process payments made to us. In connection with the processing of such payments, we do not retain any personally identifiable information or any financial information such as credit card numbers. All such information is provided directly to our third party processor, whose use of your personal information is governed by their privacy policy (https://policies.google.com/privacy and https://www.apple.com/legal/privacy/en-ww/)
legal.policy24: Third parties access to information obtained by the Service
legal.policy25: We will share your information with third parties only in the ways that are described in this privacy statement. We may disclose collected Information, in the following manners: (a) as required by law, such as to comply with a subpoena, or similar legal process; (b) when we believe in good faith that disclosure is necessary to protect our rights, protect your safety or the safety of others, investigate fraud, respond to a government request, act in urgent circumstances to protect the personal safety of our users or the public, or protect against legal liability; (c) if fikZax is involved in a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of its assets, you will be notified via email and/or a prominent notice on our Web site of any change in ownership or uses of this information, as well as any choices you may have regarding this information.
legal.policy27: Cookies are small pieces of text used to store information on web browsers.  They are used by many websites to store and receive identifiers and other information on devices, such as a handheld phone or computer. Our site and services use cookies and other similar technologies, in order to provide a better service to you and to generally improve our sites and services. Some portions of our websites are functional without cookies, and you may generally choose whether to accept cookies. Most web browsers are set to accept cookies by default, however, you may be able to delete cookies yourself through your browser's cookie manager. To do so, please follow the instructions provided by your web browser. Please note that disabling cookies will reset your session, disable auto-login, and may adversely affect the availability and functionality of our websites and the services we can provide to you.
legal.policy29: One must be 13 years old to use fikZax. We do not use the Service to knowingly solicit data from or market to children under the age of 13. If a parent or guardian becomes aware that his or her child has provided us with information without their consent, he or she should contact us. We will delete such information from our files within a reasonable time.
legal.policy31: fikZax takes reasonable steps to protect your information from loss, misuse, and unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no Internet or email transmission is ever fully secure or error free. In particular, email sent to or from us may not be secure. Therefore, you should take special care in deciding what information you send to us via email. Please keep this in mind when disclosing any information to fikZax.
legal.policy33: If you have any questions regarding privacy while using the Service, or have questions about our practices, please contact us via email at privacy@fikZax.com.

These Terms of Service are intended to be and are solely for the benefit of fikZax and you and do not create any right in favor of any third party. These Terms of Service will be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Portugal, without reference to its conflict of laws principles. All disputes arising out of or relating to these Terms of Service will be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of competent jurisdiction located in Portugal, and each party irrevocably consents to such personal jurisdiction and waives all objections to this venue.

cookieConsent.text10: This site uses cookies to provide you with a great user experience. By using fikZax, you accept our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.

pricing.title: Let's Get Started Now
pricing.text00: Click on the buttons below to install the fikZax app!!!

pricingFAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
pricingFAQ.title10: Do you offer a free trial period?
pricingFAQ.text10: Yes, we do! We offer a 30-day free trial according to Apple's and Google's stores respective policies, meaning that you will have 30 days to try fikZax and, after that you will be charged monthly.
pricingFAQ.text20: Yes, of course! You can cancel your subscription at any time. If and when you decide to do so, you will be able to use the robot up until the current subscription period. After that, the robot will be inactive, but you still have a fully functioning fikZax app.
pricingFAQ.text30: Our subscription is sold trough Apple's and Google's stores, therefore you can use any of the payment method available there (that are MANY!!!).
pricingFAQ.text40: We are more than happy to answer any questions you may have! Please do contact us.

pricingCountry.text00: You are currently seeing subscriptions plans' prices valid in

pricingStoreTradeMark.text10: Google Play and the Google Play logo are trademarks of Google LLC.
pricingStoreTradeMark.text20: App Store and the App Store logo are trademarks of Apple Inc.

help.title: Here To Help
help.title110: Start by selecting the Facebook page on which the fikZax bot will work
help.text110: Use your business' Facebook page to have the fikZax bot on. In case you do not have a Facebook page, do not worry,
help.text111: click here to learn how to do it, it is super easy!
help.text112: Make sure that you are the page administrator - you will need that priviledge to be able to authorize the fikZax robot to operate and answer messages on your behalf.
help.text113: Another small thing that you need to make sure is that you have messages turned on in your page.
help.text114: You can easily check it here.
help.text115: Now that you are all set in Facebook, let's continue on fikZax!
help.title120: Install the fikZax app in your mobile phone or tablet
help.text120: You can freely choose between the
help.text124: versions of the fikZax app. Both have exactly the same functionalities.
help.title130: fikZax app startup and robot initial setup
help.text130: After you have installed the app, please take a look at our
help.text131: terms of service and privacy policy
help.text132: as you will need to agree with them in order to use fikZax. So, if you agree, please mark the checkbox and tap on the 'Continue with Facebook' button!
help.text133: You will be asked to grant fikZax access to your name and profile picture in Facebook. If you agree, accept and move on!
help.text134: After fikZax starts, you will see the central screen that at this moment will be pretty meaningless, as there is no data in the database.
help.text134a: Tap in the top right icon and enter the control panel.
help.text135: In the control panel you'll see some red markers. Scroll down until you find 'Scheduling Robot Setup' and tap there.
help.text136: You may tweak the robot settings latter, for now let's just accept the defaults, save and move on!
help.text137: Back to the control panel screen, tap now at 'Scheduling Robot Authorization'.
help.text137a: Yes, you need to be subscribed to use the fikZax robot. Give us a chance! Use the 30-day free trial! Remember, you can cancel at any time during the trial and nothing will be charged. So, go to the subscription page, choose your plan and subscribe!
help.text137b: After you have finished subscribing you will see your subscription details. Go back to the Control panel and tap again at 'Scheduling Robot Authorization'.
help.text138: The Scheduling Robot Authorization is a three step process. The first step asks you to grant permissions to fikZax to fetch your email from Facebook and also to list the Facebook pages that you manage. Grant the permissions and continue.
help.text139: The second one asks you to choose in which page to use fikZax. Choose and continue.
help.text139a: The third one asks you to grant permissions to fikZax to manage the page you selected before and to send messages on behalf of that page. fikZax needs these permissions to operate, please grant the permissions and continue.
help.text139b: When this is all said and done your brand new chat robot is live on Messenger!
help.text140: Enter Facebook Messenger, either on you mobile or in a computer, it works on both cases, search for your page and tap on it when found.
help.text141: You will be greeted by the robot with the message that is in the Robot Setup in the fikZax app. Press the 'Get Started' button to enter the robot.
help.text142: When inside the robot chat-room you will receive another message, also configured inside fikZax, that is designed to be shown here. This message explains the user that he or she have to use the menu to communicate with the robot.
help.text143: Now use the menu and select 'Schedule an Appointment'.
help.text144: The robot answered with a message saying that something is wrong... He is right! We still have to configure our slots!!!! So, let's move on!!!!!
help.title150: Generating your working slots and scheduling
help.text150: Get back to the fikZax app and enter the control panel again.
help.text151: There you will notice the red marker on the 'Settings' button, and also some red markers below it. To remedy that you have to configure at least one professional, one work location, one work schedule and one non-working calendar. With those in place you will be able to configure one appointment slots generation setup and actually generate your working slots.
help.text152: So, keep calm, and let's do this one step at a time!
help.title153-00: Configuring Professionals, Locations, Work Schedules and Non-Working Days
help.text153-00: In the app Control Panel, enter Settings, press 'Professionals' and an edit form will be shown to you. Fill in the blanks as required. This is pretty much standard stuff, so you should not encounter any problems.
help.text153-01: Also in the app Control Panel, enter Settings, press 'Locations' and an edit form will be shown to you. Fill in the blanks as required. This is pretty much standard stuff, also, so you should not encounter any problems.
help.text153-02: Again in the app Control Panel, enter Settings, press 'Work Schedules' and an edit form will be shown to you. Fill in the blanks as required. This is not really standard stuff, so we will go into detail about some aspects.
help.text153-03: Work Schedule name and info are what they are, there is nothing new here. Now, work schedule start date and end date will determine the time span of the working slots generation that will be done in a subsequent step, so fill this accordingly.
help.text153-04: The Working days in a week determine to which days of the week this schedule shall be applied to. For instance, if you work only Mondays and Wednesdays, you should mark just these two checkboxes.
help.text153-05: Opening and closing times are straightforward. Regarding break times, the only important thing to say is that if do not want a break just put start and end at the same time.
help.text153-06: The slot length must be greater or equal to the work in slot length.
help.text153-07: Continuing in the app Control Panel, enter Settings, press 'Non-Working Days Calendars' and an edit form will be shown to you. Definitely, this is not standard stuff, so we will go into more details.
help.text153-08: Again, no problems with name and info. In the calendar country dropdown menu you can select one of the countries that we currently support. For each of these countries, we provide calendars for some regions. The default is set to the country's federal holidays. For most countries we also provide some of its most populous regions, as well.
help.text153-09: The next thing to do is to mark the working days in a week. Maybe you work on Saturdays, or Sundays and close on Mondays and Tuesdays, in anyway, just check the working days.
help.text153-09a: Following that, you choose what years you want to include in this calendar by selecting the first and the last one.
help.text153-09b: Finally, we arrive to the Resulting Non-Working Days Calendar. With every change you make before this is dynamically changed. By tapping on any date, you will be presented with details regarding to that day. Also, by long pressing any day you can toggle this day from working to non-working and vice-versa. So, this is the place where you will set your vacations, your planned days off etc.
help.title153-10: Configuring Slots Generation, Generating Slots and Scheduling
help.text153-10: In the app Control Panel, go to Settings, press 'Appointment Slots Generation' and an edit form will be shown to you.
help.text153-11: Fill in the name of the slot plan in the way you wish. Then change the slot plan condition to ACTIVE in order to be able to generate work slots.
help.text153-12: In the four next dropdown menus select a combination of Professional x Location x Work Schedule x Non-Working Calendar that you wish to generate working slots for. Please pay attention specially to the consistency between the work schedule and non-working calendar, that is, you need to have a valid non-working calendar information encompassing all the work schedule duration span, for instance, if you have a work schedule ending on January 31st 2021 with a non-working calendar only for 2020, this will generate an error.
help.text153-13: Next, decide if you want the robot to ask you for confirmation on all the schedulings for this plan. The default is to always ask for confirmation.
help.text153-14: Last, but not least, we have the information field, where you can put some reminders or other stuff you find useful. Save the slots generation plan with the changes you have made.
help.text153-15: Now you can see a list of all the appointment slots generation plans that you have created so far. Find the one you are working on. If this is your first one then it is pretty easy!
help.text153-16: In the lower end of each slot generation plan, there are four icons that we will detail now. Tapping the trashcan icon will delete this plan, tapping the pencil icon will edit it. Tapping the slashed outlined cloud will delete any working slots previously generated by this plan. Tapping the solid cloud with an up arrow inside will generate working slots according to this plan.
help.text153-17: You should try your hand with some different configurations. Be brave! Generate working slots! The robot will take care of you! Hopefully the robot will prevent you from making mistakes like deleting a slot that was already taken by a client, and that is the behavior that we all want!
help.text153-18: Now that you have working slots to play with, go back to the central screen, set an appointment manually and then try to delete the slot plan, or even edit it and see what happens!
help.text153-19: And then comes the moment you've been working for: go back to the Messenger app and make your first scheduling!
help.text153-19a: If you have access to a different mobile phone or tablet, or even a computer, try to do it from a different device while you have fikZax running on your mobile with the central screen open. In that way, you will see that as soon as the scheduling is done by your client, the screen modifies instantly. Isn't that awesome!?!?!?!?
help.text153-19b: You should take your time to get to know your brand new robot. Schedule, cancel, reschedule and see how your fikZax app reflects the changes.
help.title210: How do I tell my robot not to schedule a certain working slot?
help.text210: As things change all the time, how to make some of your generated slots unavailable for scheduling?
help.text212: Start in the app central screen and choose the relevant combination of professional, location and date range.
help.text213: Now locate the slots that you want to render unavailable.
help.text214: One by one, double tap on the slot to enter the edit screen.
help.text215: In the edit screen, tap on the 'Appointment Slot Condition' switch to change it to INACTIVE.
help.text216: Scroll down and tap on the floppy disk icon to save your changes. After saving you will be sent back to the central screen, where you will see that the slot is greyed out and, as a result, the fikzax bot shall not offer it to any client.
help.title220: How can I make my client discover my Facebook Chat Robot?
help.text220: Go to the app's central screen. In the top left corner there is a qr-code icon. Tap in this icon.
help.text221: In case you have not yet configured your fikZax chat robot, you will see an error message. In this case, follow the 'Getting Started' section to get up and running!
help.text222: Most probably you will see a qr-code and your Facebook page logo in your screen.
help.text223: If your client uses an iphone, just ask he/she to launch the camera app and point it to the qr-code. After that, he/she shall tap in the link after the qr-code is recognized by the iphone.
help.text224: This link will take he/she directly to your robot inside Facebook's Messenger app, if he/she does not have the Messenger app installed, the installation should be done beforehand.
help.text225: If your client uses an android phone then it will depend on the mobile model. Some android mobiles do have a qr-code scanner built into the camera app and some don't. Also, some users have qr-code reading apps installed. To all of these, the procedure is the same as to the iphones.
help.text226: If it is impossible to read the qr-code, you can tap in the 'LINK' button and share an internet link to your robot.
help.text227: In this same screen, you can use the share 'QR CODE' button to share the actual image of the code together with your logo. You can use that to print your business cards or embedded in marketing materials, websites etc.
help.title230: How can I prevent the user from sending text messages to me in Messenger?
help.text230: fikZax's default behavior is to allow the users to type text messages, even though the robot will not answer those. We found this to be the natural path, as most of our customers had already used Messenger before they started to use fikZax.
help.text231: On the other hand, to someone that will start using Messenger with the foremost purpose of scheduling, it can be interesting to be able to block text messages. So, we implement this feature also in our robot, and you are free to decide!
help.text232: So, if you want or need to keep receiving text messages it is all fine, and we shall even notify you in the fikZax app about the messages received and you can keep track if you have read them or not.
help.text233: Now let's see how to block the text messages, if you wish to do so.
help.text234: From the central screen, tap on the top right icon and enter the app's control panel. Once there, tap on settings. In the dropdown menu that will open select 'Scheduling Robot Setup'.
help.text235: Once inside the 'Scheduling Robot Setup' scroll down and tap on the pencil icon to edit the robot.
help.text236: Find the item 'Robot Menu Text Input'. Tap on the switch to toggle between allowing or not the users to type text in Messenger.
help.text237: Scroll down and save your changes.
help.text238: As this configuration is saved inside Facebook's servers, for this to take effect, you need to log out of fikZax, log back in and do the 'Scheduling Robot Authorization' again.
help.title240: How can I avoid fikZax asking for confirmation on every scheduling?
help.text240: fikZax's default behavior is to ask the professionals to confirm every scheduling. As it is very common to our customers to receive schedulings from different sources, we elected to do so to avoid double scheduling problems.
help.text241: Nevertheless, other professionals may want to have completely automatic booking system and fikZax can do that, also.
help.text242: As it is a professional's decision, we have chosen not to integrate this in the robot configuration, rather locating it in the 'Appointment Slots Generation Setup'. By doing so you can customize fikZax with a finer granularity.
help.text243: The downside to this is that once you have generate the slots it is a done deal and, in other to change it, one shall have to delete the slots and generate them again.
help.text244: After this digression, let's answer the question! So, to create slots that do not need professional confirmation you shall enter the 'Control Panel' and then, inside 'Settings' choose 'Appointment Slots Generation'.
help.text245: Once there, tap on the pencil to edit the setup. If you receive a 'Cannot Edit' error, please refer to the FAQ covering this subject. If not, find the switch named 'Ask Professional for Appointment Scheduling Confirmation' and tap on it to change it to 'DO NOT ASK professional for scheduling confirmation'. Scroll down and save the setup by tapping the floppy disk.
help.text246: To generate the slots follow the instructions outlined in the 'Getting Started' section.
help.title250: I am trying to delete or modify an 'Appointment Slots Generation Setup' but fikZax will not let me. How can I solve this?
help.text250: This is a safety precaution in order avoid an accidental deletion of slots that were already selected by one of your clients.
help.text251: But one may ask: Why I cannot change the 'Appointment Slots Generation Setup', as I will not change the actual slots???
help.text252: In our point of view the 'Appointment Slots Generation Setup' is nothing but a summarized representation of the slots, as there is no point in changing just the Setup, eventually you will want to reflect the changes in the slots. So, in order to avoid an unecessary loss of time, we included this safety check.
help.text253: Ok, understood, but i need to modify (or delete) the (expletive) 'Appointment Slots Generation Setup' anyway!!!!
help.text254: So, let's get to the subject at hand. In order to be able to change the 'Appointment Slots Generation Setup' you will need to cancel the slots that eventually are scheduled. This has to be done one by one.
help.text255: Start in the app central screen and choose the relevant combination of professional, location and date range.
help.text256: Now locate the slots that you want to cancel the appointment.
help.text257: One by one, double tap on the slot to enter the edit screen.
help.text258: In the edit screen, tap on the checkbox 'Appointment Slot is Cancelled'. Please note that, if fikZax robot was used for the scheduling, a message will be sent to the client notifying about the cancellation.
help.text259: Scroll down and tap on the floppy disk to save your changes. After saving you will be sent back to the central screen, where you will see that the slot is now marked as cancelled.
help.text259a: Go back to the 'Appointment Slots Generation Setup' screen. Tap the pencil again to edit and see that now you can modify the 'Appointment Slots Generation Setup'
help.text259b: If you try to delete the 'Appointment Slots Generation Setup' you will receive an error. In order to do that you will have to firstly delete the generated slots. To do so, you have to tap the outlined crossed cloud icon. After the slots are deleted, then you can proceed to delete the slots' Setup.
help.title260: How can I set my vacation period in fikZax?
help.text260: From the central screen, tap on the top right icon and enter the app's control panel. Once there, tap on settings. In the dropdown menu that will open select 'Non-Working Days Calendars'.
help.text261: Find the calendar you want to edit and tap on the pencil icon to enter the edit screen. If the pencil icon is greyed-out, it means that this calendar is already in use in a generated slot so, for safety reasons it cannot be edited. You will need to delete the previously generated slots in order to modify this calendar.
help.text262: Please bear in mind that all the changes that you need to make to the non-working days calendar must be done prior to including it in an 'Appointment Slots Generation Setup', what means, necessarily, that no slot has been generated based on this calendar.
help.text263: Now that you are in the calendar edit screen, scroll down to see the resulting non-working days calendar. Tap on any of the dates and you will be shown a dialog stating the details of that date. Long press any date and you will toggle that date state from working to non-working and vice-versa. By following this procedure you can set your vacation dates.

contactus.title: Get in Touch
contactus.text70: Your message is very important to us. We will reply to you as soon as possible in the email address you just provided. Thanks again!
contactus.text80: An Error Ocurred And Your Message WAS NOT SENT
contactus.text90: Your message is very important to us. Our servers could not be reached, most probably you are offline right now. Please try again later.

contactReason.text12: I have a question about price
contactReason.text20: I'm having trouble with my Facebook Page configuration
contactReason.text30: I'm having trouble with my subscription at Apple Store/Google Play

secClientVideos.title: The Client using the fikZax Robot
secClientVideos.text00: In this case we are using the MyMensor Service Center that was created for demonstration purposes. Here you will see how your client interacts with the fikZax Messenger robot.
secClientVideos.clientVideo00: The client starts the robot and is greeted by fikZax, with the text you may edit on the app. Your client then uses the menu to choose SCHEDULE AN APPOINTMENT. Immediately the robot presents the first available slot to your client, that decides to accept it.
secClientVideos.clientVideo01: Immediately after you have verified and accepted your client scheduling, she/he will receive a message stating that you have verified and accepted the appointment. The client will be informed about the reminder message, also.
secClientVideos.clientVideo02: In the day before the appointment date, the fikZax robot will send a reminder message to your client. As soon as your client confirms the appointment you will be informed, as you can see in the next section.
secClientVideos.clientVideo03: Something comes up and your client needs to reschedule the appointment from 9 to 10am. By using the MY APPOINTMENTS menu item, she/he checks the appointment time and reschedules. You are notified immediately!

secProfessionalVideos.title: The Professional using the fikZax App
secProfessionalVideos.text00: Again, we use the MyMensor Service Center for this demonstration, now on the professional side of things. Here you will see what happens in the fikZax app as the client interacts on the fikZax Messenger robot.
secProfessionalVideos.profVideo00: As a result of the scheduling of an appointment on Feb 10th, the circle around that date turns to yellow and an icon appear on the top right showing the need of verification. Tapping the date make details appear, showing the 9am slot was scheduled and needs verification.
secProfessionalVideos.profVideo01: To verify the scheduling, you tap on the top right icon, check and confirm the scheduling. After accepting the dialog showing client notification success, make your way back to the central screen and see the slot marked as VERIFIED BY PROFESSIONAL.
secProfessionalVideos.profVideo02: Just watch the VERIFIED BY PROFESSIONAL chip turns into CONFIRMED as your client answers positively the message received from your fikZax robot on the day before the set appointment. Please note that the client could also have rescheduled or cancelled the appointment.
secProfessionalVideos.profVideo03: Watch as something comes up and your client needs to reschedule the appointment from 9 to 10am. You are instantly notified, the 9am slot becomes open and now the 10am needs verification. We stop here, as the verification process was covered already by another video.

secWhoUses.title: Who uses fikZax?
secWhoUses.text00: Professionals who want to focus on what matters most.
secWhoUses.text11: Health professionals who use fikZax are able to give their undivided attention to patients. No more interruptions to manage reschedulings!
secWhoUses.text101: Take appointments for multiple professionals in multiple work locations.
secWhoUses.text102: Your clients can self reschedule, lowering no-shows.
secWhoUses.text103: You can confirm all appointments before they are set.
secWhoUses.text21: Organize your saloon agenda like never before. No more taking calls to schedule clients while working!
secWhoUses.text202: Detailed calendar and work schedule configuration.
secWhoUses.text203: Know right away of any cancellation.
secWhoUses.text31: Organize your training staff agenda with an always-on 24/7 solution!
secWhoUses.text301: Work in many places? No problem! Take appointments in multiple locations.
secWhoUses.text302: Have different calendars and work schedules according to location.
secWhoUses.text303: Need to confirm appointments for one workplace and not for another? We've got you covered!
secWhoUses.text41: You are a Teacher, a Freelancer, you name it! fikZax can make your life so much easier.
secWhoUses.text401: Take appointments for multiple work locations.
secWhoUses.text402: Personalize your client experience by editing the robot sentences.
secWhoUses.text403: Have your work agenda always live in your pocket!

secMainFeatures.title: You'll be up and running in minutes
secMainFeatures.text00: Your client is able to reach you anytime from virtually anywhere, by using YOUR robot inside the Facebook Messenger.
secMainFeatures.text10: The scheduling confirmation is not just a dull reminder. The customer can confirm the appointment, as well as reschedule or cancel it. This will significantly decrease the no-show cases.
secMainFeatures.title20: NO 'POWERED BY XYZ' messages to YOUR clients
secMainFeatures.text20: fikZax brand is COMPLETELY INVISIBLE to your customer. We think this way: it is your client, not ours! It will work as YOUR private robot, with YOUR brand, inside YOUR Messenger account, no hidden propaganda!
secMainFeatures.text30: You just download the fikZax app and use it! You can do it yourself, no special knowledge, no messing with your website!
secMainFeatures.title40: NO NEW APP to be installed by your CLIENT
secMainFeatures.text40: Your client most probably has Facebook's Messenger already installed. That is all he needs!
secMainFeatures.title50: NO COMPUTER NEEDED to use fikZAX
secMainFeatures.text50: No 'to access this you will have to use the web...'!!! With fikZax all you need is YOUR mobile to configure and run your complete work scheduling solution.

secExplainerVideo.title: What do they say about an image?
secExplainerVideo.text00: If an image is worth a thousand words, imagine a video....
